name: Add new rows to a Google Sheets spreadsheet for new Userback feedback
description: Every time there is a new feedback created via Userback, Make will automatically create a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet of your choice. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1e4mpXCyJ0MzPeuJOe8u7nQC5taXKK50R15BAigrMq38/edit?usp=sharing).
